## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/rect#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/kernel/rect#3721583)

[`bottom`](/documentation/kernel/rect/1401532-bottom)The vertical coordinate of the lower-right point of the rectangle.[`left`](/documentation/kernel/rect/1401403-left)The horizontal coordinate of the upper-left point of the rectangle.[`right`](/documentation/kernel/rect/1401437-right)The horizontal coordinate of the lower-right point of the rectangle.[`top`](/documentation/kernel/rect/1401419-top)The vertical coordinate of the upper-left point of the rectangle.
